downloadTitle: Microsoft Teams panels Custom Background Template
downloadDescription: PSD templates to create a background for Teams panels devices
detailsSection: You can customize the background of your Teams panels home screen experience. With Teams Rooms Pro or Teams Shared Devices license, you can specify backgrounds for the home screen. To help you create backgrounds for your displays, use these .PSD templates. These templates include sizing and placement information and best practices to ensure the information and corporate branding you provide are visible to all.
systemRequirementsSection: PSD file reader such as Adobe Photoshop or Paint.NET
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.

relatedResourcesSection.title: download Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android Custom Background Templates from Official Microsoft Download Center
